title: Redspot v0.4 报告
description: 10个月前，我们提交了Redspotv0.1的国库提案#0，并描述了未来4个版本的开发规划。几周前，我们提交了v0.4的国库提案#44，现在我们已经完成了全部的计划。Redspot has become a powerful development environment, testing framework and asset pipeline for Pallet-Contracts. Redspot is trying to let the development of ink! be projectized and simplify the testing and interacting with contracts.  源码和文档在https://github.com/patractlabs/redspot/
